experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Team Lead)
experience.description: Leading ML engineering initiatives for health technology platform, managing cross-functional teams and deploying production-scale AI systems.
achievements: Engineered and refined core ML systems for prediction modeling using TensorFlow and PyTorch for deployment
Managed and streamlined production environments on AWS EC2 and SageMaker, integrating S3 storage and SQL databases
Hosted APIs with Flask and Django, resulting in minimal downtime, high throughput, and an 80% reduction in processing time and 50% decrease in latency
Developed and maintained agentic LLM-based systems for personalized health guidance using structured prompts and RAG pipelines
Integrated OpenAI APIs with in-house databases to generate summary insights for healthbot
Interpreting and synthesizing user log data to measure compliance with user plans, biological and psychological effects
Overseeing and coordinating three cross-functional teams on API management and product enhancements

experience.title: GenAI Engineer
experience.description: Developed advanced generative AI systems for educational applications, focusing on adaptive learning and personalized student assessment.
achievements: Engineered an agentic chatbot system for student testing, assessment and learning feedback for a 'Virtual-Adaptive-Learning-Assistant' (VALA)
Implemented RL based prompt tweaking for changing and measuring technical depth, difficulty and subject matter alignment
Customized learning plans for every user based on repetitive learning and testing patterns
VALAs were beta tested by 50 students from grades 6th through 8th in the tuition services of MyEdMaster
Platform is being tweaked to be implemented in charter schools in California and Texas (projected to be used by 600+ students in 2 years)

experience.title: Teaching Staff + Grader

Principles of Data Science (PODS) - 800+ students (4 semesters)
Introduction to Data Science (IDS) - 600+ students (3 semesters)
Big Data - 400+ students (2 semesters)
Mentoring students in practical applications of data science and machine learning
Grading assignments and providing detailed feedback on student projects
Conducting office hours and tutoring sessions for complex topics

experience.title: Research Project - Bank Loan Default Modeling

Achieved an AUC score greater than 0.8 along with good accuracy
Executed comprehensive data cleaning, engineered feature extraction, selection and modification
Explored various modeling approaches, ranging from xgboost, gbm, etc. to Neural Networks
Developed production-ready risk assessment model
